___debugSetting.description: The debug setting of the deployment.

___template.description: The template content. It can be a JObject or a well formed JSON string. Use only one of Template or TemplateLink.

___parameters.description: Deployment parameters. It can be a JObject or a well formed JSON string. Use only one of Parameters or ParametersLink.

___templateLink.description: The template URI. Use only one of Template or TemplateLink.

___parametersLink.description: The parameters URI. Use only one of Parameters or ParametersLink.

_88TemplateLink.description: Entity representing the reference to the template.

___contentVersion.description: If included it must match the ContentVersion in the template.
